subject: Amazon Listing
description_text:
Hi, I have a question about the amazon listing it is very confusing to me.
Which one is the latest one plus X version. Because I want to make sure im
getting the latest plus x version. Can you link me that and with the
discount too?

conversations.body_text: Hi Natsu Dragneel,     Hello, this is our latest PlusX pedal, which supports the VAM motor. Please note that the motor and power supply need to be purchased separately.   https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-pro-plus-x-pedals     https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor

I mean for amazon link? because your amazon listing is kinda confusing.. so
which ASIN number is for the latest one?

On Sun, Jun 15, 2025 at 7:51 PM support@simsonn.com
Hi Natsu Dragneel,  Here is the link of the PLUS X version: https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0FBFZ6VLY

why is that you have another listing for much cheaper but it also says
plusx version? could it be you mean thats old version thats why cheaper?

On Mon, Jun 16, 2025 at 2:50 AM support@simsonn.com
Hi Natsu Dragneel,  Sorry for the confusion caused. We will check it. As long as the title says PLUS X, we will send you PLUS X. You can choose to buy it yourself.

Ok I just dont want to deal with returns cause by the wrong prduct thats
why I asked, and btw can I ask the dffirence between the vam and vam pro?

On Mon, Jun 16, 2025 at 8:20 PM support@simsonn.com
Hi Natsu Dragneel,  The vibration strength of the VAM Pro has been improved, and the vibration frequencies are now more diverse, providing a more realistic feedback experience.

H I just purchased simpson vam, how do I use it works on simson manager but
how can I connect to the game?


On Sun, Jun 22, 2025 at 10:26 PM support@simsonn.com

Hi Natsu Dragneel,    Currently, version 2.0.8 supports telemetry for 8 games, and version 2.0.9 will expand support to over 10 mainstream titles.  However, SimHub has already released version 9.9.3, which includes compatibility with our pedals, so they are now fully functional in supported games.  As for usage recommendations: In Speed mode, excessive travel or continuous rotation may lead to motor damage. We suggest setting a reasonable speed range and limiting the vibration intensity to around 50%, with a maximum of 70%. Also, try to avoid prolonged continuous operation to extend the motor’s lifespan.
